actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Gregory B. Dymond, Samuel K. Gibbons, Jack C. Kean, James D. Nichols and Roy A. Redmond.

summary.text: Relieves five named individuals of all liability for repayment of specified amounts to the United States. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to one of the individuals in full satisfaction of a claim against the United States.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Gregory B. Dymond, Samuel K. Gibbons, Jack C. Kean, James D. Nichols and Roy A. Redmond.
